name: ALCO_CP_Test16 Misc Items, through Git

items.name: PDXEncryptionAssetPublisher
items.instruction: Manually enable and set to read events

items.name: ALCO_CP_BackIn
items.instruction: Enable and verify linked business rules are included.

items.name: ALCO Text multi value new name March 21st
stepsys
items.instruction: Users created on target systems use temporary password. Reset manually if passwords are managed by STEP.

items.name: eCatalogs
items.instruction: Price/Terms List/Collections from Lists must be recreated manually. Ignore impact analysis.

signedGlobalXml:
<STEP-ProductInformation ContextID="GL"  WorkspaceID="Main"  ExportTime="2024-04-29 15:02:58"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <Qualifiers>
    <Qualifier ID="std.lang.all">
      <DimensionPointLink DimensionPointID="std.lang.all"/>
    </Qualifier>
  </Qualifiers>

  <AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeGroup ID="ATG_ALCO" ShowInWorkbench="true" ManuallySorted="false" ParentID="Attribute group root">
    <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ATG_ALCO</Name>
  </AttributeGroup>
  </AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeList>

    <Attribute ID="ATD_ALCO_2DD" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Property" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="std.lang.all">ALCO country dependency</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>
      <DimensionLink DimensionID="Country"/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="ATG_ALCO"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

  </AttributeList>

  <BusinessRules>
    <BusinessRule ID="ReadExternalActivityLog" Scope="Global" Type="Function" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Function #1 (JavaScriptBusinessFunctionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings/>
  <functionparameters>
    <functionparameter alias="date" type="Date" contract="DateBindContract"/>
    <functionparameter alias="filter" type="String" contract="StringBindContract"/>
  </functionparameters>
  <returntype type="java.lang.String"/>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
var dateString = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("YYYY-MM-dd").format(date);
logger.info(dateString + " " + filter);
var file = new java.io.File(new java.io.File("diag/activity/"+dateString.substring(0,7)),dateString + ".log")
var reader = new java.io.BufferedReader(new java.io.FileReader(file, java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
try {
while (reader.ready()) {
	var line = reader.readLine();
	if (line.contains(filter)) {
		logger.info(line);
	}
}
return "";
} finally {
	reader.close();
}
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="BusinessFunctions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ReadExternalActivityLog</Name>
      <Description>For testing purposes</Description>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
  </BusinessRules>

  <IntegrationEndpoints>
    <InBoundIntegrationEndpoint ID="ALCO_CP_BackIn" UserTypeID="InboundEndpoint user-type root" PreProcessorPluginID="ImportChangePackagePreProcessor" ProcessPluginID="Import" PostProcessorPluginID="Default" ErrorReporterPluginID="DefaultInboundErrorReporter" QueueForEndpoint="InboundQueue" QueueForProcssing="In" MaxNumberOfActiveBackgroundProcesses="1000" MaximumAgeOfFailedBackgroundProcesses="604800000" MaximumNumberOfFailedBackgroundProcesses="100" MaximumAgeOfSucceededBackgroundProcesses="604800000" MaximumNumberOfSucceededBackgroundProcesses="100" TransactionType="NONE" ResponsibleUserID="STEPSYS" EnableRetry="false" ReceiverPluginID="hotfolder" MessagesPerBackgroundProcess="1">

  <EventProcessors>
    <EventProcessor ID="PDXEncryptionAssetPublisher" UserTypeID="Event Processor user-type root">

<!-- Definition:
Configuration=
<plugin id="PDXEncryptionAssetPublisher">
  <simple id="BatchSize">1000</simple>
  <simple id="DaysToRetainEvents">0</simple>
  <simple id="FailRetryEnabled">true</simple>
  <simple id="FailRetryPeriod">30d</simple>
  <simple id="HoursToRetainOldProcesses">168</simple>
  <simple id="LinesPerBGP">1000</simple>
  <simple id="MaxOldProcesses">100</simple>
  <simple id="OptimisticLockRetryEnabled">false</simple>
  <simple id="OptimisticLockRetryPeriod"/>
  <simple id="Priority">1</simple>
  <simple id="Queue">EVPROC</simple>
  <simple id="ResponsibleUser">step://user?id=STEPSYS</simple>
</plugin>
PluginConfiguration=
<plugin id="AssetPublisherEventProcessorPlugin">
  <simple id="ExtendedLogging">false</simple>
  <simple id="HandleDeleteEvents">true</simple>
  <simple id="PublishInheritedContent">DimensionPoints<split>PublishInheritedContent=false<split></simple>
  <simple id="StorageProvider">StorageProvider=step://GatewayIntegrationEndpoint?id=PDXEncryptionGW<split></simple>
  <simplelist id="ImageConversions">
    <entry>ImageConversion=ImageConversion<split>ImageConversionType=Conversion<split>Name=PDX<split>PathAttribute=step://attribute?id=asset_path2<split>StorageTemplate=Stibo_Systems_97/$assetID$_$contentdimensionpointsID$.$extension$<split>VersionAttribute=step://attribute?id=asset_version2<split></entry>
  </simplelist>
  <simplelist id="NotificationEventQueues"/>
</plugin>
ScheduleSpecification=
<entries>
  <entry class="com.stibo.util.scheduledefinition.ScheduleDefinition$ScheduleNever"/>
</entries> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="EventProcessors"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">PDXEncryptionAssetPublisher</Name>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <EventQueue QueueStatus="Read" DaysRetained="0">
